title: flairs
body: how to put flairs so everybody can see them

replies.body: If you're talking about the new [**Honor loading screen flairs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148), those will only show up after getting honored by 2 members of your premade or 1 random teammate. After that, the very next match will have your Honor Flair displayed on the loading screen. You do need to get the honors each match in order for it to show up in the next one.
